article: a new center of power has emerged inside john kerry 's presidential campaign , with several veteran democratic operatives moving quickly to consolidate their influence and effectively take over the nominee 's daily message and strategy in the six weeks until the election .
abstract: kerry denies shakeup but new leaders have come aboard
